name: Luna
bioText: Luna is 3 years old. She is an active cat and child friendly

name: Tiger
bioText: Tiger is 11 years old. He is a very sociable cat, gets along with both people and other cats.

name: Duck
bioText: Duck is a 7 year old Bombay. Duck is very much a loner and will become agressive if approached. Experienced owners only. Not suitable for kids.
